channel.title: News on Georgia Mountain Haven
channel.description: Recent content in News on Georgia Mountain Haven

item.title: New Year
item.description: New Year Happy new year! Hope everyone had a good holiday. Planning to keep the schedule the same. Some goals for the upcoming year are: Dedicated email address for class, lesson, and training communication. Mailling list to facilitate communication, sending news and updates. Find local places to spread the word about classes and inviting more people to join. If you have any suggestions let me know.

item.title: Resuming regular schedule
item.description: Resuming regular schedule Hope everyone had a great week off and are ready to get back to the regular schedule. Please see the online schedule here. We will go a little lighter this week to ease back into the things.
